hero.description: I’m a developer specialized in the development of user interfaces, providing great experiences.

about.title: About Me
content: Hello, I'm Felipe Eduardo, a Frontend developer. I hold a Bachelor's degree in Information Systems from the School of Technology - UNICAMP. With over 4 years of experience in development, I am currently focused on creating exceptional interfaces for global users.
I am passionate about assisting individuals in solving their problems and continuously exploring new technologies and methodologies to address challenges.
What truly motivates me is the realization that my expertise is making a positive impact on others' lives!

contact.title: Interested in working with me ?
description: I’m always looking forward for new opportunities. Send an email to
or reach me out in a social media.
